content: the knitted bookmark is a quick project to make with intermediate knitters in mind using cable knit stitches you will create an intricate design you could gift this for st patrick s day yarn fingering weight yarn/4 ply amount of yarn around 10g/40 meters i used a small amount of fingering yarn hand-dyed in spring green from one mini skein you could use any yarn weight and needle size for this project but it will affect the bookmark s finished size knitting needle size i used three double pointed needles for this design two to knit and one as a cable needle size 2 25 mm needles us 1 skills level intermediate this is an intermediate-level knitting pattern the techniques involved are ribbing and cable stitches sizing the bookmark length measures - 8 inches the width measures - 2 5 inches don t forget to follow handy little me on social media for more updates and to share your finished projects instagram @handylittleme facebook facebook com/handylittleme ravelry ravelry com/people/handylittleme pinterest pinterest co uk/handylittleme copyright the patterns and photographs of this design are the property of handy little me this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern collection or any items created using the directions in this pattern collection without consent please visit my terms of use page for additional information
